SELECT REQ_ID , REQ_TTL , PRCS_STTS , CRTR , TO_CHAR(STRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(EXPCT_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPCT_END_DT FROM REQ R WHERE TSK_STTS = '003_02' AND PRJ_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM PRJ WHERE PRJ_ID IN (SELECT PRJ_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM TM_MBR WHERE EMP_ID = #{empId}) TM JOIN PRJ_TM_MBR PTM ON PTM.TM_MBR_ID = TM.TM_MBR_ID)
AND PRJ_NM LIKE '%' || #{prjNm} || '%' )

SELECT R.REQ_ID PK_COL , R.REQ_ID , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY R.CRT_DT || R.REQ_ID DESC) RNUM , R.CRT_DT , R.CRTR , R.MDFY_DT , R.MDFYR , R.USE_YN , R.DEL_YN , R.DTL_REQ , TO_CHAR(R.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.EXPCT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPCT_END_DT , R.PRJ_ID , R.MN_DVLPR , R.TST_RSLT , R.TSK_STTS , R.PRCS_STTS , RSLT_CD.CD_NM RSLT_CD_NM , TSK_CD.CD_NM TSK_CD_NM , PRCS_CD.CD_NM PRCS_CD_NM , R.PRRTY , R.REQ_TTL , R.REQ_CNFR_NM , PJ.PRJ_NM PJ_PRJ_NM , TST.TSTR_ID TST_TSTR_ID , TSTR_E.L_NM TSTR_E_L_NM , TSTR_E.F_NM TSTR_E_F_NM FROM REQ R INNER JOIN PRJ PJ ON R.PRJ_ID = PJ.PRJ_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD RSLT_CD ON R.TST_RSLT = RSLT_CD.CD_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD TSK_CD ON R.TSK_STTS = TSK_CD.CD_ID INNER JOIN CMN_CD PRCS_CD ON R.PRCS_STTS = PRCS_CD.CD_ID LEFT JOIN REQ_TSTR TST ON R.REQ_ID = TST.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN EMP TSTR_E ON TST.TSTR_ID = TSTR_E.EMP_ID WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND R.REQ_ID LIKE '%' || #{reqId} || '%'

SELECT R.REQ_ID PK_COL , R.REQ_ID , DENSE_RANK() OVER(ORDER BY R.CRT_DT || R.REQ_ID DESC) RNUM , R.CRT_DT , R.CRTR , R.MDFY_DT , R.MDFYR , R.USE_YN , R.DEL_YN , R.DTL_REQ , TO_CHAR(R.STRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') STRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.EXPCT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EXPCT_END_DT , R.PRJ_ID , R.MN_DVLPR , R.TST_RSLT , R.TSK_STTS , R.PRCS_STTS , R.PRRTY , R.REQ_TTL , R.REQ_CNFR_NM , PJ.PRJ_NM PJ_PRJ_NM , TST.TSTR_ID TST_TSTR_ID , TSTR_E.L_NM TSTR_E_L_NM , TSTR_E.F_NM TSTR_E_F_NM , AF.ORG_FL_NM , AF.UUID_FL_NM , AF.FL_SZ , AF.FL_EXT FROM REQ R INNER JOIN PRJ PJ ON R.PRJ_ID = PJ.PRJ_ID LEFT JOIN ATCH_FL AF ON R.REQ_ID = AF.FRGN_ID LEFT JOIN REQ_TSTR TST ON R.REQ_ID = TST.REQ_ID LEFT JOIN EMP TSTR_E ON TST.TSTR_ID = TSTR_E.EMP_ID WHERE R.DEL_YN = 'N' AND R.REQ_ID = #{_parameter}
